Interpreter¶

Interpreter module

This is a basic interpreter for Daffy assembly code. The interpreter expects lines in the form:

$name: optype([argname=$opname.attr | <float value>], ...)
exception daffy.vm.interpreter.ParserSyntaxError[source]¶

A syntax error

exception daffy.vm.interpreter.ParserUndefinedState[source]¶

The parser reached an undefined state

daffy.vm.interpreter.parse_line(line)[source]¶

Parse a line of input
